timeline.message: CB-6514 AWS Datalake deployment on mow-dev is failing with HV000028 Unexpected exception during isValid

timeline.bodyText: Is it just a quick fix? It is strange that we are removing the validation.
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: i am not sure, in case of sdx internal, cloudbreak validates stackrequest anyway, but if we want to validate it earlier, we can do it, but we have to make everyone to put the name into the input json, and that will duplicate data on api (since name is a pathparam also), so maybe this worth a discussion
replies.author: horadla23

replies.bodyText: I put up the validation a few days back, it is fairly safe to remove it. I did not calculate with the consequences that this object of the request is used in such a relaxed way.
replies.author: bergerdenes
